// competitive-verifier: PROBLEM http://judge.u-aizu.ac.jp/onlinejudge/description.jsp?id=DSL_2_A
#include "../segtree.hpp"

int op(int l, int r){return min(l,r);}
int e(){return INT_MAX;}

int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(nullptr);

    int n,q;
    cin>>n>>q;
    segtree<int,op,e> seg(n);
    while(q--){
        int com,x,y;
        cin>>com>>x>>y;
        if(com==0){
            seg.set(x,y);
        }
        else{
            y++;
            cout<<seg.prod(x,y)<<"\n";
        }
    }
}
#line 1 "src/test/a.cpp"
// competitive-verifier: PROBLEM http://judge.u-aizu.ac.jp/onlinejudge/description.jsp?id=DSL_2_A
#line 1 "src/segtree.hpp"
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

template<class S,S(*op)(S,S),S(*e)()>struct segtree{
  int n;vector<S> t;
  segtree(int n_): n(__bit_ceil(n_)), t(n*2, e()) {}
  void set(int i,S x){for(t[i+=n]=x;i>>=1;)t[i]=op(t[i*2],t[i*2+1]);}
  S operator[](int k){return t[k+n];}
  S prod(int l,int r){
    S L=e(),R=e();
    for(l+=n,r+=n;l<r;l>>=1,r>>=1){
      if(l&1)L=op(L,t[l++]);
      if(r&1)R=op(t[--r],R);
    }
    return op(L,R);
  }
};
#line 3 "src/test/a.cpp"

int op(int l, int r){return min(l,r);}
int e(){return INT_MAX;}

int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(nullptr);

    int n,q;
    cin>>n>>q;
    segtree<int,op,e> seg(n);
    while(q--){
        int com,x,y;
        cin>>com>>x>>y;
        if(com==0){
            seg.set(x,y);
        }
        else{
            y++;
            cout<<seg.prod(x,y)<<"\n";
        }
    }
}
